name: LD34 :: Blokkenslat
description:
Blokkenslat was build for Ludum Dare 34 (Two buttons controls

Ludum Dare 34 Entry - Please Vote Here

Controls:

  • Right Arrow :: Turn Right / Attack
  • Left Arrow :: Turn Left / Block
  • Both at the same time :: Move Forward / Unlock Door

Objective:

Find the key to unlock the door to the next level. Try to survive and see how deep you can go into the dungeon.
